e: 例⃝「`曹~`操~`挾天子以令諸侯~」。
d.f: `先秦~`及~`漢~`初~`帝王~`分封~`並~`受~`帝王~`統轄~`的~`列國~`國君~`的~`統稱~；`後~`多~`用來~`指~`地方~`上~`掌管~`軍政~`大權~`的~`長官~。

English: feudal princes, esp. the monarchs (dukes or princes) of the several vassal states `諸侯~`國~|诸`侯~国 of Zhou during Western Zhou and Spring and Autumn periods 11th-5th century BC
